name: Dangerous Relationship
description: "Dangerous Relationship" is a game where you can enjoy the dangerous world of dating a celebrity. Get seduced while you're on the job and try to keep your relationship a secret!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Resolution: 1280x720

reviews.review_text: It pretty much had a lot of boring storylines and and one of the guys, Kei, was bascially a rap-ist. This game is basically a trashy romance novel.
